product_name: Level Six SUP Rider Tech Top - Men's
long_description: When you're paddling in constant spray or heavy mist in the air, the Level Six SUP Rider Tech Shirt shields you from the elements thanks its water-resistant fabric. Hydro-Shield fabric fends off spray and light moisture to creat excellent next-to-skin comfort. Low-profile hood.
short_description: When you're paddling in constant spray or heavy mist in the air, the Level Six SUP Rider Tech Shirt shields you from the elements thanks its water-resistant fabric.
